title: Item Sets ~~
body:
Hi Riot,

Previously you said that item sets will be back in about patch 7.10

Can you please give an indication of how many months away patch 7.10 is? 

I used to enjoy the game so much more working on item sets and perfecting them, it helped so much, I have found without them im doing alot worse in the game and forgetting what to build etc.

Hope to hear from you soon

Cheers {{champion:56}}

replies.body:
I think there might be some confusion. We have previously said that the *AIM* was to bring it to PBE in patch 7.10

http://i.imgur.com/88PjKlq.png

It is currently on PBE for testing. Depending on how it goes on PBE it could come in the next few patches =D  
https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-70P5E6hqrUM/WRue2Q0nggI/AAAAAAABDfE/318rip4c49EtG_kIrZc0Po8eWBvd-ZqTwCLcB/s1600/itemsets1.png

Not to hijack the topic or anything, but what about the 10 bans?

It was highly implied that we would get them near the beginning of the new season _(said at the end of last season)_, and the new season is now closer to the end than the beginning.

So while the pros live it up in luxury, we still have to make the lesser-of-two-evils choice down here in the mortal realm. _And there are far too many 'evils' to be left roaming free._

is there anything you can tell us about that?

Can you find the source where it said it would be near the beginning of this season?

As for when its actually coming, a key blocker was getting the updated client rolled out.

> We're still planning to look into 10 bans once the new client's out (changes needed to champ select for extra bans would be made in that, not the old client).

The above comment was made late last year
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/99Oykczu-so-about-10-bans?comment=0005

Hopefully with the updated client rolling out globally now we will be able to focus more on updated features like Honor 2.0, 10 bans, and team competition.

You can watch the latest video update here (this was in March)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pFwrySPCff8

You can see a bit of info here in the midseason update as well (a couple of weeks ago). Specifically in the looking foward section

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/midseason-2017

Sure, I can try and find it, it was a long time ago though and I didn't think to save it.
Ill give it a go though.

ok so there still isn't an ETA for us then, all goods, but i thought id ask just incase.

At least with the new client out of the way, it is in the clear.

Yea I saw that video, it was pretty informative! and the mid season video also mentioned the bans.

it'll be just like Christmas when they come out though xD so keen.

I simply hope that, if item sets aren't coming back (I loved them but I know alot of people couldn't care less), then can we delete our old item sets. It kind of erks me that my old item sets that are missing a load of items because items got reworked or removed are still in the new client. I either want to update my item sets or remove them entirely. Having outdated item sets just makes me feel uncomfortable.

Given that they're still up on PBE, could be as early as next patch, or if things aren't working so hot maybe the one after. The fact that it's up on PBE means it's close, but clearly there was a problem that meant they couldn't ship it in 7.10 and I wouldn't count on that not happening again.
Hi Riot, so can you please give a more definite estimate on how long off item sets are in weeks/months?
